alert.note: Alert for Cole; Osage (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 17 at 5:57PM CDT until July 17 at 6:45PM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: The National Weather Service in St Louis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Cole County in central Missouri... Southwestern Osage County in central Missouri... * Until 645 PM CDT. * At 557 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Brazito, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Jefferson City, Wardsville, Taos, Russellville, Westphalia, St. Thomas, Brazito, Hickory Hill, Lohman, Schubert, Koeltztown, Osage City, Osage Bend, and Loose Creek. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
